description: This file defines the IFriendService interface, which specifies methods for handling friend requests and friend list management in a social application backend.

classes.name: IFriendService
classes.description: Interface declaring methods for sending, accepting, rejecting friend requests, listing requests, retrieving friends, and checking friendship status.

methods.name: SendRequestAsync
methods.description: Initiates a friend request from one user to another asynchronously.

methods.name: AcceptAsync
methods.description: Accepts a pending friend request asynchronously.

methods.name: RejectAsync
methods.description: Rejects a pending friend request asynchronously.

methods.name: ListAsync
methods.description: Lists friend requests for a user, optionally filtering for pending only.

methods.name: GetFriendsAsync
methods.description: Retrieves the list of friends for a user.

methods.name: AreFriendsAsync
methods.description: Checks if two users are friends asynchronously.
